title: PUBNUB: Making Engaging Realtime Experiences a Reality in India
description:
Realtime Communication is providing enterprises with an innovative way to deliver better, more cost-effective customer service.
Technology companies in India are racing towards a more connected and always-on world, making it easier, faster, safer, and more convenient for everyday people to do the things they need and achieve the things about which they dream. PubNubâ€™s Realtime Communication Platform provides the backbone that any company can rely on to deliver engaging experiences that users love, including fast-growing companies like Swiggy, Apollo Health and others.

title: @property: giving superpowers to CSS variables
description: The Houdini Properties and Values API is coming to your CSS file in Chromium 85.
